'''Fruits Aplenty''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe can be obtained by operating the [["Collective of Plenty"#"Fruits Aplenty" Machine|"Fruits Aplenty" Machine]] in [["Collective of Plenty"]].

Depending on the quality, Fruits Aplenty restores '''26'''/'''28'''/'''30'''% of Max HP and regenerates '''450'''/'''620'''/'''790''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds for the selected character. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
